Never ends�.

*  The voice and feelings were back.
The ones that sometimes felt like�like she didn�t have control of her own 
mind. This happened a lot when she was first created, had to learn to 
control that beast of a mode.
It had taken her YEARS to master it and now, since she had been reborn in 
this new body, it was beginning to push its luck.
The damage she had obtained from Vehement hadn�t helped either.  She�d had a 
bit of trouble avoiding the signature seeking shots and one had actually got 
her, which hadn�t left any wound but too a good hunk out of her armor and 
knocked the breath from her lungs.
But now the voice echoed in her mind while she blinked past the ash and 
tried to look towards the CF.
The shield were still holding she noticed, but even her scanners were 
detecting that they wouldn�t last forever.
And while she thought of that, the voice began yammering.*

SBM: �  Don�t think that, just because you escaped me once by dying that you 
can just believe that I never existed. As long as that spark beats within 
that chest I�ll be there, like a the darker part of your own shadow.�

* Iron Raptor glanced around the battlefield, groaning when she scanned a 
gustalt forming.
Just what she needed.
She coughed from the thick air and felt her opened side sting, the area 
around the wound becoming numb from the loss of mech fluid there.
It was prying at her mind, clawing it�s way towards her main systems so that 
it could load itself into them and become something of what it was before. 
But it sensed something was there, maybe the Matrix. Puzzling it and making 
it look the situation over again until it discovered it�s power.*

SBM: � This could be useful�.�

* Without warning it seemed to turn and coil around the power of the Matrix 
that beat deep inside of her spark, harnessing the power and using that to 
rebuild it�s program.
It didn�t hurt and she wasn�t too worried about it, but it wasn�t comforting 
to know that a nightmare could start any day now like before.
But�finally�..*

SBM: � Now, do it!�

* She couldn�t help herself.*

� ULTRA BEAST MODE!!!�

* In her mind, white light spilled in and blinded everything, all awearness 
of the outside world disappeared.
The sword dropped from her grasp, falling to the ground with a clang seconds 
before the trasnformation. The image of the giant beast seemed to come 
straight from her back before the sheere size of it blocked out her small 
image, the image of the beast solidifying with a roar that almost deafened 
all the noise of the battle. Echoing out towards every being.
It�s horrid mouth closed, the entire form standing 20 ft, towering over the 
heads of the normal transformers on the field.
All traces of the fembot were gone, the black form of the Nostelga standing 
in her place.
The transformation was complete. However, as her form had disappeared, her 
mind ruled that of the creatures.
But, not like before, not, instead of flesh there was armor, full ultrametal 
armor.
The BEAST was BACK!*



* Iris moved in through the fog, keeping her eyes peeled for any target that 
might come into range.
Her shoulder was badly torn from the missile sent by Reflector before, the 
armor peeled back and mech-fluid oozing from the wound.  But she kept a 
stiff upper lip.
Her rifle loaded for another round, she continued to stalk the ash until a 
sound reached her scanners.
Iris�s eyes snapped open and she stared out into the field�where a nightmare 
was waiting.
< Oh�no�.>
Had the beast survived?*
